ing: 2 (16 ounce) cans whole peeled tomatoes, with liquid
1 (1 ounce) envelope dry onion soup mix
1 (15 ounce) can cut green beans, drained
des: "This tomato and cabbage soup was rumored, in days of old, to melt away those thighs."
ins: Place carrots, onions, tomatoes, cabbage, green beans, peppers, and celery in a large pot. Add onion soup mix, tomato juice, beef broth, and enough water to cover vegetables. Simmer until vegetables are tender. May be stored in the refrigerator for several days.
